summary: This will add a basement to Breezehome.
descriptionHtml:
[youtube]ByCAu4ahVl0[/youtube]
(walkthrough video at bottom)

This mod will add a basement to Breezehome that comes with the house when purchased. The basement is entered using stairs located below the existing stairs. It also updates the lighting in the home. In the basement you will find various storage and display items such as:

6 weapon plaques
1 shield plaque
1 weapon rack (3 slots)
2 mannequins
2 storage chests
2 strong boxes
3 books shelves (6 shelves total - 66 books total)

and various other furnishings.

This mod is also avaliable at:

Steam - [url=http://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=85766565]http://www.steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=85766565[/url]

Be sure to check out my website and subscribe to me on YouTube for more!

Website - [url=http://www.demorus.com]www.demorus.com[/url]
YouTube - [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/demothekeysmasher]DemoTheKeySmasher[/url]
Twitter - [url=http://www.twitter.com/demotks]DemoTKS[/url]

Thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4042154]Robinsage[/url] for help with the mannequins!

Thanks for checking out my mod. Enjoy!

[youtube]L_U_m-zbkCg[/youtube]

[youtube]vZPC7kqEH7M[/youtube]
author: Demorus
